name: Greater Drag
description: Foes that you drag are thrown out of balance.
prerequisites: Str 13, Improved Drag, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.
benefit: You receive a +2 bonus on checks made to drag a foe. This bonus stacks with the bonus granted by Improved Drag. Whenever you drag a foe, his movement provokes attacks of opportunity from all of your allies (but not you).
normal: Creatures moved by drag do not provoke attacks of opportunity.
staminaText: When you succeed at a drag<sup>APG</sup> combat maneuver check, you can spend 5 stamina points to gain up to 10 feet of movement for your drag. You can use this movement in place of your normal movement, but only to drag an opponent.
description_zh: 被你拖拽的敌人会失去平衡。
prerequisites_zh: 力量13，精通拖拽，猛力攻击，基本攻击加值+6。
benefit_zh:
你所实行的拖拽战技检定获得+2加值。这个加值与“精通拖拽”提供的加值叠加。每当你拖拽敌人，他的移动会引起你的盟友的借机攻击（但是不包括你）。

通常状况：被拖拽的生物不会引起借机攻击。
